title: Understanding the Format Cells Option
text: To add custom borders, you need to access the 'Format Cells' option. This is where you can customize the appearance of your cells, including borders.

title: Selecting the Right Border Style
text: Once in the 'Format Cells' menu, you can choose different border styles. Make sure to select the style that fits your needs.

hintAnswer: select the cells, then "format cells," select colors, border style, outline
